snippet: Without the free content created by its 850 million users, Facebook would surely not be on the verge of a multibillion-dollar initial public offering.
abstract: Without the free content created by its 850 million users, Facebook would surely not be on the verge of a multibillion-dollar initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO - By my calculation, Mark Zuckerberg, Facebook's founder and chief executive, owes me about $50.

headline.main: Disruptions: Facebook Users Ask, 'Where's Our Cut?'
